items.name: EdAd - CPC - Mode Mobile Highlights Jan
items.content:
This company grew 32,481%

No, it’s not Nvidia…

One of today’s fastest-growing software companies might surprise you. Mode Mobile ($MODE) saw 32,481% revenue growth from 2019 to 2022—ranking #1 on Deloitte’s 2023 list.

Their EarnPhone turns phones into income generators, helping users earn & save $325M+. Now, you can invest in their pre-IPO at just $0.26/share.

Uber disrupted taxis. Airbnb transformed hotels. Mode Mobile is shaking up the $500B smartphone industry. With their Nasdaq ticker secured, time is running out to invest.

Invest Now at $0.26/Share
